thread.title: AirAsia rolls out lucrative offer to drive domestic, international travelTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: AirAsia rolls out lucrative offer to drive domestic, international travelTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: AirAsia rolls out lucrative offer to drive domestic, international travelTravelandtourworld.com
text:
AirAsia rolls out lucrative offer to drive domestic, international travel Published on : Sunday, October 18, 2015
Low-cost airline AirAsia has rolled out a lucrative offer of three million promotional seats to over 20 countries across Asia and Australia from Oct 19- 25.
 
 
The special fares were targeted to drive domestic and international travel within the extensive regional networks for both AirAsia and AirAsia X airline groups, the airline said in a statement.
 
 
For domestic travelling within Malaysia, guests can fly to Penang and Kota Baharu with all-in-fares from as low as RM29 one-way; Langkawi from RM39 one way; Kuching from RM89 one-way while Kota Kinabalu is RM109 one way, all departing from Kuala Lumpur.
 
 
Guests can also fly further from Kuala Lumpur to destinations such as Pattaya, Thailand with all-in-fares from as low as RM99 one way; Goa, India from just RM229 one way; Busan, Korea from just RM249 one way while the very popular Sapporo, Japan is only from RM359 one way.
 
 
Booking for these promotional seats can be made from Oct 19-25, 2015 for travel period from March 1 to Oct 29, 2016 at airasia.com, AirAsia’s mobile app on iPhone and Android devices, as well as the mobile site.
 
 
The promotional all-in-fares quoted are for one-way travel only inclusive of taxes.
